message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with creating graphic representations of content using images, layout, and stylization. This involves selecting content images, placing them into panels, and applying stylization. These tasks are related to computer graphics (cs.GR), computer vision (cs.CV), multimedia (cs.MM), human-computer interaction (cs.HC), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
